entry.title: md5
entry.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <link href="https://cdn.bootcss.com/twitter-bootstrap/3.3.5/css/bootstrap.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <link href="https://cdn.bootcss.com/twitter-bootstrap/3.3.5/css/bootstrap-theme.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
  <style>
    * {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        box-sizing: border-box;
      }

      #file {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block;
        opacity: 0;
      }

      .row {
        border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
        padding: 10px;
      }
    </style>
  <title>æ–‡ä»¶MD5å€¼è®¡ç®—</title>
</head>

<body>
  <div class="container">
    <h1>æ–‡ä»¶MD5å€¼è®¡ç®—</h1>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-xs-12">
        <div class="btn btn-default">
          <input type="file" id="file" />é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div id="process" style="display: none">
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°ï¼ˆMac: 1MB=1000KBï¼‰: <span id='fileSize1K'>0</span></div>
        <div class="col-xs-12">æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°ï¼ˆWindows/Linux: 1MB=1024KBï¼‰: <span id='fileSize1K24'>0</span></div>
      </div>
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">æ ¡éªŒæ–‡ä»¶è¿›åº¦: <span id='progressValue'>0</span>%</div>
      </div>
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">è€—æ—¶: <span id='timeSpant'></span>ç§’</div>
      </div>
      <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">MD5å€¼: <span id='hash'></span></div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
  <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/twitter-bootstrap/3.3.5/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script>
  <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/spark-md5/3.0.0/spark-md5.min.js"></script>
  <script>
    document.getElementById('file').addEventListener('change', function () {
      $("#process").slideDown()
      $('#timeSpant').html('...')

      let now = Date.now()
      var blobSlice = File.prototype.slice || File.prototype.mozSlice || File.prototype.webkitSlice,
        file = this.files[0],
        chunkSize = 2097152,                             // Read in chunks of 2MB
        chunks = Math.ceil(file.size / chunkSize),
        currentChunk = 0,
        spark = new SparkMD5.ArrayBuffer(),
        fileReader = new FileReader();
        const sizeContent = function(k) {
          return file.size + 'å­—èŠ‚ = '
            + (file.size / k).toFixed(2) + 'KB = '
            + (file.size / k / k).toFixed(2) + 'MB = '
            + (file.size / k / k / k).toFixed(2) + 'GB'
        }
        $('#fileSize1K').html(sizeContent(1000))
        $('#fileSize1K24').html(sizeContent(1024))

      fileReader.onload = function (e) {
        console.log('read chunk nr', currentChunk + 1, 'of', chunks);
        spark.append(e.target.result);                   // Append array buffer
        currentChunk++;

        if (currentChunk < chunks) {
          loadNext();
        } else {
          const spant = ((Date.now() - now) / 1000).toFixed(2)
          const hash = spark.end();
          $('#timeSpant').html(spant)
          $('#hash').html(hash)
          console.log('åŠ è½½å®Œæˆï¼Œè€—æ—¶: ', spant, 'ç§’');
          console.info('hashå€¼ï¼š', hash);  // Compute hash

        }
      };

      fileReader.onerror = function () {
        console.warn('oops, something went wrong.');
      };

      function loadNext() {
        var start = currentChunk * chunkSize,
          end = ((start + chunkSize) >= file.size) ? file.size : start + chunkSize;

        fileReader.readAsArrayBuffer(blobSlice.call(file, start, end));
        $("#progressValue").html(((currentChunk + 1) / chunks * 100).toFixed(2) * 1)
      }

      loadNext();
    });
  </script>

</html>

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™

ç‰¹æ€§ğŸ‘‡

ğŸ“ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æœ€é…·çš„ Markdown è¯­æ³•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿåˆ›ä½œ

ğŸŒ‰ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç»™æ–‡ç« é…ä¸Šç²¾ç¾çš„å°é¢å›¾å’Œåœ¨æ–‡ç« ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡

ğŸ·ï¸ ä½ å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ–‡ç« è¿›è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç»„

ğŸ“‹ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•ï¼Œç”šè‡³å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥èœå•

ğŸ’» ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ Windowsï¼ŒMacOS æˆ– Linux è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ğ–¦ğ—‚ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ–» ğ–¯ğ–ºğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ æˆ– Coding Pages å‘ä¸–ç•Œå±•ç¤ºï¼Œæœªæ¥å°†æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå¹³å°

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“æˆ–è‹±è¯­

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ä½¿ç”¨åº”ç”¨å†…é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–ä»»æ„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¼ºå¤§çš„ä¸»é¢˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰èƒ½åŠ›

ğŸ–¥ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ OneDriveã€ç™¾åº¦ç½‘ç›˜ã€iCloudã€Dropbox ç­‰è¿›è¡Œå¤šè®¾å¤‡åŒæ­¥

ğŸŒ± å½“ç„¶ Gridea è¿˜å¾ˆå¹´è½»ï¼Œæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä¸è¶³ï¼Œä½†è¯·ç›¸ä¿¡ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šä¸åœå‘å‰ ğŸƒ

æœªæ¥ï¼Œå®ƒä¸€å®šä¼šæˆä¸ºä½ ç¦»ä¸å¼€çš„ä¼™ä¼´

å°½æƒ…å‘æŒ¥ä½ çš„æ‰åå§ï¼

ğŸ˜˜ Enjoy~
